com.scg.domain

Class TimeCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scg.domain.TimeCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TimeCard>

    public final class TimeCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<TimeCard>, java.io.Serializable
    Encapsulates a time card capable of storing a consultant's billable and non-billable hours for a week.
    Author:
    Russ Moul
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimeCard

        public TimeCard(Consultant consultant,
        java.util.Date weekStartingDay)
        Creates a new instance of TimeCard.
        Parameters:
        consultant - The Consultant whose information this TimeCard records.
        weekStartingDay - The date of the first work day of the week this TimeCard records information for; assumed to be a Monday.

      • appendTime

        private void appendTime(java.util.Formatter formatter,
              java.util.List<ConsultantTime> hours,
              boolean billable)
        Add the consulting hours lines to the invoice.
        Parameters:
        formatter - the formatter to add the lines to
        hours - the list of consulting hours
        billable - if true billable hours will be added otherwise non-billable
